title: Museums and galleries monthly visits
publisher: Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport
description: Monthly provisional statistics on the number of visits to the DCMS-sponsored museums and galleries are published here every quarter.
datasetNotes: On the landing page available in XLS and CSV formats
sizingNotes: Multiple Simple table structure on 2 tabs tables on each tab are a different format.  Financial period.
notes: Although not specifically Covid-19  the spreadsheets may allow the impact of the pandemic to be derived.
